full_text: Brian Keith Shaw  is a retired American professional basketball player and former head coach for the Denver Nuggets of the National Basketball Association . At 6'6" he could play both guard positions, but was used primarily at point guard over the course of his 14 seasons in the league. He is known for his alley-oop passes to former teammate Shaquille O'Neal, and for his clutch plays, especially against the Portland Trail Blazers in the 2000 NBA Playoffs.
title: Brian Shaw
